nodes.text: Ororo Transportation was a competitor of Xizor Transport Systems. Xizor had his aide Guri murder Ororo's top executives while he convinced Emperor Palpatine to destroy an Ororo shipyard by telling the Emperor that it was a Rebel base (a claim that was at least partially true as the shipyard housed a number of X-wings).
Its chief operating officer was Tuyay, its chief of security was Dellis Yuls, and its chief financial officer was Z. Limmer.
Ororo Transportation was a member of the Tenloss Syndicate.
Nim Zanti was an Ororo lieutenant assigned to Vergesso Base during the Galactic Civil War.
